RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 58. Claiming Purse 14400. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 6 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000, if for $9,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ARROGANTE was reserved early, advanced three wide on the turn, shifted out leaving the three sixteenths and closed well on the outside to edged clear late, driving. NEWSDLEY pressed the pace and made a three wide bid on the turn to duel for command, then had a long drive in the lane and won the duel but was outfinished by the winner late. SCOREBOARD LILY set a pressured pace on the inside, then dueled for command on the turn and through the lane but faded late. FINISHING TOUCH was bothered and bumped at the start, advanced two wide on the turn, angled out by the furlong marker and had a belated rally. BUSTIN WIDE OPEN was settled early, two wide on the turn and had no rally. DESI'S REWARD broke outwardly at the start, then rated off the frontrunners early and dropped to the inside and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Arrogante
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, 3 wide move turn, shift out 3/16, closed, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Finishing Touch
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, 2 wide turn, angled out 1/8, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Newsdley
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 3 wide, bid 3 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Bustin Wide Open
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle inside, 2 wide turn, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Scoreboard Lily
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, dueled 1/4, long drive, late fade

ENTRY.NAME: Desi's Reward
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke outwardly, rated back, inside turn, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 2 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 79. Allowance Purse 28000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR PENNSYLVANIA BRED. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 6 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since March 6 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $16,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GAMESTONKS was well rated three to four wide, made a four wide bid on the turn, went on even terms for the lead leaving the turn and hit the front nearing the furlong marker and drew clear to prove best under a drive. WILL TAKE ROSES pressed the early pace and made a three wide bid on the turn to gain a short lead, then was headed by the winner off the turtn and proved to be no match for that rival late, second best. EARLY FROST was bumped at the start, made a four wide run on the far turn but could not sustain that bid, bested rest. PERKEO was reserved early and lacked a rally. ALONG THE WAY tracked the early pace on the inside and tired. ESPERANNNA set a pressured pace on the inside and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Perkeo
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Early Frost
ENTRY.OWNER: IBB Thoroughbred and Stem Brandon Paul
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, 4 wide run turn, flattened out, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Esperannna
ENTRY.OWNER: Bone Robert D and Brown Jr Edward J
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Along the Way
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace inside, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Will Take Roses
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 3 wide, bid 3 wide, short lead turn, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Gamestonks
ENTRY.COMMENT: well rated 3-4 wide, bid 4 wide, drew clear, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 78. Allowance Purse 28000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR PENNSYLVANIA BRED. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 6 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 6 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $16,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MOBEER was away alertly to set the pace while in the two path, drew out leaving the turn and then was kept to pressure to prove best. SIMPLY STATED tracked the pace along the inside, angled out when straightened and finished well late to be clearly second best. Z'S SO GOOD chased the early pace and was three wide on the turn, came five wide into the lane, lugged in leaving the three sixteenths, then was corrected and rallied mildly to best the rest. FOXY JUNIOR was settled early and three wide on the turn and lacked the needed rally. MEAN TWEETS was reserved early and saved ground on the turn and lacked a rally. NEON SIGN stalked the pace four wide and weakened in the lane. LEONIDS stalked the pace three wide and in between rivals and then was empty in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Leonids
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace between horses, 3 wide turn, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Z's So Good
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, 3 wide turn, came 5 wide, lugged in 3/16, mild rally

ENTRY.NAME: Mean Tweets
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, inside turn, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Foxy Junior
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 3 wide turn, needed rally

ENTRY.NAME: Simply Stated
ENTRY.OWNER: W M T Stable and Sylmar Farm
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace inside, angled out, finished well, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Mobeer
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace 2 wide, drew out upper stretch, driving

ENTRY.NAME: Neon Sign
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 4 wide, weakened stretch,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 10000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE NOVEMBER 6. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PATTY'S BOY was rated early, made a inside run on the turn, then continued that run and closed well up the inside to get up in time to prove best, driving. PAL CAL set the early pace while two wide, drew clear on the turn and then was caught late to just fail. PECOS BILL stalked the early pace four wide, then shifted in on the turn and was two wide by the quarter pole and had no late kick. THE ANGRY MAN pressed the pace three wide and weakened on the turn. LONG TOM lacked a rally. ALWAYS FORGIVEN threw head at the start, chased the pace on the inside and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Always Forgiven
ENTRY.COMMENT: threw head start, chased inside, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Patty's Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated early, inside run turn, closed inside, up late, driving,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Flint W. Stites & Robert M. Bouse

ENTRY.NAME: Long Tom
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Pal Cal
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace 2 wide, drew clear turn, caught late

ENTRY.NAME: The Angry Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 3 wide, weakened turn

ENTRY.NAME: Pecos Bill
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 4 wide, shifted in, 2 wide 1/4 pole, no kick

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 91. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 28900. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR PENNSYLVANIA BRED OR CLAIMING PRICE $25,000. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race S ince April 6 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 6 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Races Where Entered For $25,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SEEKING THE DREAM stalked the early pace two wide, made a three wide bid leaving the quarter pole, shook clear leaving the turn and then remained clear to prove best, sharp. KNICKERSINATWIST was rated between rivals, waited behind rivals by the quarter pole, split horses leaving the three sixteenths and finished willingly to be clearly second best. STAND BY YOU was settled back early, made a wide rin on the turn and came six wide into the lane and had a late rally. KILIMANJARA was reserved early, two wide on the turn and came three wide into the lane and passed the tiring rivals. NO EASY ANSWER set the pace on the inside and was headed leaving the turn and weakened. MOONSAFE tracked the pace three wide and made a four wide bid by the quarter pole but weakened in the drive. LANFRANKOPHILE was settled early, four wide on the turn and came wide into the lane and had no rally. ECLIPTICALS SARAH was settled early, three wide on the turn and then was empty. BELLA PRIMA tracked the early pace on the inside and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Bella Prima
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace inside, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Kilimanjara
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, 2 wide turn, came 3 wide, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: No Easy Answer
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, headed upper stretch, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Eclipticals Sarah
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled early, 3 wide turn, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Stand by You
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled back, wide run turn, came 6 wide, late rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Knickersinatwist
ENTRY.OWNER: Short Straw Stable Jackson Stephen G and Jackson Debbie
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated between horses, waited 1/4, split 3/16, willingly, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Seeking the Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 2 wide, bid 3 wide, drew clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Moonsafe
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 3 wide, bid 4 wide, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Lanfrankophile
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, 4 wide turn, came wide, no rally,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 90. Allowance Purse 31400. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 6 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since March 6 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $16,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances). (If deemed in advisable by management to run this race over the turf course it will be run on the main track at One Mile. If more than 10 horses remain it will be run at One Mile and Seventy Yards.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RECRUITER was four wide into the first turn, then vied for the lead three wide, drew clear entering the turn and then drew off leaving the turn while still three wide, then was given one right handed pop with the riding crop by the furlong marker and then was wrapped up the final sixteenth to prove much the best. UPSTATE AND BACK vied for the lead on the inside and then proved to be no match for the winner while saving the place award gamely. SPINNING MUSICIAN was five wide into the first turn, stalked the pace four wide, then was three wide by the quarter pole, made a bid for the place award but was outfinished for that spot. SPELLED WELL tracked the early pace and tired. SPEAK OF THE DEVIL steadied nearing the three quarter peg on the inside and then failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Speak of the Devil
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied 3/4, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Upstate and Back
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead inside, no match, gamely for place

ENTRY.NAME: Spelled Well
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Recruiter
ENTRY.OWNER: Nick Sanna Stables LLC and Lynch Cathal A
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4 wide first turn, vied 3 wide, clear turn, drew off, ridden out,

ENTRY.NAME: Spinning Musician
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 4 wide, 3 wide 1/4 pole, out kicked 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 88. Claiming Purse 13600. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE FEBRUARY 6. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 6 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000, if for $7,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Wher e Entered For $6,250 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WILD CARAMELO was away alertly to set the early pace while two wide, drew clear on the turn and then was kept to mild left handed crop pressure to prove best. TRIPLE A. PLUS tracked the early pace and made a three wide bid by the quarter pole, finished willingly to be clearly second best. ROCKET BLAST tracked the pace on the inside but lacked the needed winning bid, held show. CHARGING LION was allowed to settle early, came four wide into the lane and had a mild late rally. HASHTAG WINNING was allowed to settle on the inside and had no rally. EQUAL JUSTICE prompted the pace two to three wide and was between rivals by the quarter pole and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Rocket Blast
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace inside, needed stretch bid, held 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Equal Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace 2-3 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Hashtag Winning
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, saved ground, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Charging Lion
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, came 4 wide upper stretch, mild rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Triple A. Plus
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, bid 3 wide, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Wild Caramelo
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace 2 wide, drew clear turn, driving,
